title: Data Scientist
description:
Deloitte Services LP includes internal support areas such as Sales Excellence, Marketing and Communications, Human Resources/Talent, Information Technology, Facilities Management, and Financial Support Services.

Data Scientist

The Data Scientist provides direct support to GPS Sales Excellence by providing sales and pipeline analytics of Deloitte’s Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system (Salesforce), business development artifacts, and client documents.

The GPS Data Scientist is responsible for collaborating with Leadership and other Enabling Areas to understand their processes and data and therefore determine the most efficient and cost-effective manner to provide insights and subsequently predictive analyses on our bidding strategies, pipeline, and future sales.

This individual will apply natural language processing/machine learning to facilitate research, gather, and design processes and/or use technology to mine various business development artifacts, such as proposals, client documents, competitive research, and other corporate data repositories to identify ways to improve our win rate. The data scientist will also need to integrate data from disparate sources into an efficient and intuitive rational database structure.

Work you’ll do

As a Data Scientist within our team you will:
Assist Sales Excellence leaders with Mercury sales and pipeline data analyses
Coordinate with other internal organizations to understand business development processes and data
Provide recommendations and predictive analysis to senior leaders on improving bid strategies and subsequently win rates.
